name: Do-less
body:
Do Less is a companion app for the native Reminders app on iOS, by which you could choose the three most important tasks to do at a time.

Do Less helps you focus and accomplish more by doing less.

[Download on the App Store](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/do-less/id687301889?mt=8&uo=4)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
